TITLE: Displaying Open-Source Android App Information in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This Markdown snippet creates a table to showcase information about various open-source Android applications. It includes app icons, names, descriptions, repository links, download links, and developer information. SOURCE: https://github.com/mobilenetworkltd/openapk/blob/main/categories/development.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` | App | Info | | :--- | :--- | | | XMLForge
format XML files

OpenAPK

A curated list of awesome open source apps and games for Android. Updated daily!

``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Adding a Tip Box in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to create a tip box using GitHub-flavored Markdown, providing instructions for app submission and displaying a download badge. SOURCE: https://github.com/mobilenetworkltd/openapk/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` > [!TIP] > To get your app listed, open an issue mentioning your repo ! > > Use our download banner in your repo readme ! > > ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Listing Categories in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to create a list of categories with links to their respective markdown files, organizing the content of the OpenAPK project. SOURCE: https://github.com/mobilenetworkltd/openapk/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ## Categories - [Connectivity](categories/connectivity.md) - [Development](categories/development.md) - [Food](categories/food.md) - [Games](categories/games.md) - [Graphics](categories/graphics.md) - [Internet](categories/internet.md) - [Messaging](categories/messaging.md) - [Money](categories/money.md) - [Office](categories/office.md) - [Multimedia](categories/multimedia.md) - [Navigation](categories/navigation.md) - [Phone & SMS](categories/phone-and-sms.md) - [Reading](categories/reading.md) - [Religion](categories/religion.md) - [Science & Education](categories/science-and-education.md) - [Security](categories/security.md) - [Sports & Health](categories/sports-and-health.md) - [System](categories/system.md) - [Theming](categories/theming.md) - [Time](categories/time.md) - [Writing](categories/writing.md) - [Xposed](categories/xposed.md) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Navigation Links in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to create inline navigation links in Markdown, allowing users to quickly jump to different sections of the document.
